Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Goblet with a convex base, straight body, restricted mouth and tapered lip. Two incised horizontal lines accentuate the location of the maximum diametre on the exterior surface, which also bears a geometrical pattern in white paint. The latter is found in the upper section of the body, just above the double incision and is comprised of three series of three superimposed horizontal marks, spread out around the circumference of the vase.
